title: The First Sign and the First Plague
summary: Exodus 7 records Moses and Aaron confronting Pharaoh. Aaron’s staff turns into a serpent, but Pharaoh’s magicians imitate it. God then begins judging Egypt with the first plague: turning the Nile into blood.

faq.question: What was the first miraculous sign before Pharaoh?
faq.answer: Aaron’s staff became a serpent and swallowed the magicians’ staffs.

faq.question: What was the first plague?
faq.answer: The Nile River and all water sources in Egypt turned into blood.
